name: Potato, Sausage and Egg Breakfast Casserole
author: Pam Cooking Spray
summary: An easy breakfast recipe of shredded hash brown potatoes, Egg Beaters®, sausage, red bell pepper and Cheddar cheese baked together.
ingredients: 1  serving PAM® Original No-Stick Cooking Spray
4 each frozen Banquet® Brown 'N Serve™ Turkey Sausage links, sliced
2 cups refrigerated shredded hash brown potatoes
½ cup chopped red bell pepper
½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Spray 8x8-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray; set aside
Combine Egg Beaters®, milk and garlic salt in large bowl
Add sausage, potatoes, bell pepper and cheese; stir to combine
Bake 45 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean
